q:
You are working on models in Django. Which of the following code will you use to create a model that defines a class called STUDENT that contains the name, age, and email ID of students:

  1. from django.db import models
class STUDENT(models.Model):
   Name = models.CharField(max_length=35)
   Age  = models.IntegerField()
   Email= models.EmailField(max_length=50)
  2. from django.db import models
class STUDENT(models.Model):
   Name = STUDENT.models.CharField(max_length=35)
   Age  = STUDENT.models.IntegerField()
   Email= STUDENT.models.EmailField(max_length=50)

  3. from django.db import models
class STUDENT(models.Model):
   Name = model.CharField(max_length=35)
   Age  = model.IntegerField()
   Email= model.EmailField(max_length=50)
In Big Data, which of the following processes are flexible to parallelism in an ensemble model?
